## Data Dictionaries {#data-dictionary}
::: {.callout-note collapse=true title="income_brackets"}

| **Variable**      | **Name**                        | **Description**                                                                 |
|-------------------|----------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `bracket_id`       | Bracket ID                       | Unique identifier for each income bracket.                                               |
